entities.name: the little window
entities.description: The window is described as 'little' and is the point of entry for the protagonist's journey.

entities.name: he
entities.description: The protagonist, referred to as 'he', is the main character in the story.

entities.name: the page
entities.description: The page is described as having an opening through which the protagonist passes.

relationships.description: The protagonist, 'he', passes through the little window into a new environment.
The protagonist, 'he', enters from the page into a new environment.
